subject: Order #SSN3579
description_text:
Hello,
i'm writing u about order number SSN3579. I have changed my mind and would
to cancel it. As i can see u didn't sent it yet anyway. Thank you.

Stjepan Krakić

Koranska 12

10370 Dugo Selo

091/525-6822

conversations.body_text: Hi Stjepan Krakić,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with replenishment expected by the 27th. At that time, we shall dispatch your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping charges incurred.

As i said i would like to cancel my order. Thank you.

Stjepan Krakić

Koranska 12

10370 Dugo Selo

091/525-6822
Hi Stjepan Krakić,    Alright, we'll cancel it for you. May I ask why you'd like to cancel the order? This is important to us.

I am no longer interested.

Stjepan Krakić

Koranska 12

10370 Dugo Selo

091/525-6822
Hello,  my order is still not cancelled? I would like to get my money back soon. Thank you.
